publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1943.1 Dr Richard Simpson: Hepatitis C—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1943) in the name of Shona Robison, leave out "acknowledges" and insert "commends the hard work undertaken by those staff involved in delivering 40 out of 41 action points in Phase I of the Scottish Government’s Hepatitis C Action Plan and welcomes".
